p: Compounds 244 and 245 were evaluated against phytopathogenic fungi Cladosporium cladosporioides and C. sphaerospermum ( Cladosporium sphaerospermum) using direct bioautography. The results showed that 244 exhibited antifungal activity, with a detection limit of 5 μg, for both fungi, while compound 245 displayed weak activity (detection limit > 5 μg), with a detection limit of 25 μg. Nystatin was used as a positive control, showing a detection limit of 1 μg [ 80].
